name.ja: <ruby>捕食植物<rt>プレデター・プランツ</rt></ruby>バアル・テア
name.zh-CN: 捕食植物 羊角麻蝇王

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Predaplant" or "Starving Venom" monster from your face-up Extra Deck or GY. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can banish this card and 1 "Polymerization" from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. You can only use each effect of "Predaplant Baalthea" once per turn.
